org.openimaj.image.model.pixel

Class PixelClassificationModel<Q,T extends Image<Q,T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.model.pixel.PixelClassificationModel<Q,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    Q - Type of pixel
    T - Type of image
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, ImageClassificationModel<T>, EstimatableModel<T,FImage>, Model<T,FImage>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MBFPixelClassificationModel

    public abstract class PixelClassificationModel<Q,T extends Image<Q,T>>
extends Object
implements ImageClassificationModel<T>
    Simple model for classifying pixels. When learning assumes ALL provided sample pixels are positive exemplars, and that anything not given is negative.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • estimate

        public boolean estimate(List<? extends IndependentPair<T,FImage>> data)
        Description copied from interface: EstimatableModel
        Estimates the model from the observations in the list of data. The data must contain at least EstimatableModel.numItemsToEstimate() pairs of dependent and independent data. It may contain more, in which case the estimate method may choose to make use of this data for validation, or obtaining a better model by a least squares method for example.
        Specified by:
        estimate in interface EstimatableModel<T extends Image<Q,T>,FImage>
        Parameters:
        data - Data with which to estimate the model
        Returns:
        true if a successful estimate was made, false otherwise
        See Also:
        EstimatableModel.numItemsToEstimate()

      • numItemsToEstimate

        public int numItemsToEstimate()
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        The minimum number of observations required to estimate the model.
